description: The Canadian Forces School of Communications & Electronics (CFSCE), located at Canadian Forces Base Kingston in Kingston Ontario, has a requirement to procure electrical supplies for training purposes.
full_summary:
# Tender Notice: Electrical Products for the Canadian Forces School of Communications & Electronics

## Project Overview

The Canadian Forces School of Communications & Electronics (CFSCE), located at Canadian Forces Base Kingston in Kingston, Ontario, has a requirement to procure electrical supplies for training purposes. This tender notice is an RFP (Request for Proposal) against Supply Arrangement under the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

## Tender Details

* **Tender Reference Number**: CB-3998-58356135
* **Solicitation Number**: W2037-23206A/A
* **Publication Date**: February 24, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: March 13, 2023, at 2:00 PM EST
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: March 13, 2023
* **Expected Contract End Date**: March 29, 2024

## Tender Status

This tender is listed as CANCELLED, and there are no goods or services required as per the provided documents.

## Supplier Information

* **Contracting Entity**: Department of National Defence
* **Contracting Entity Address**: 101 Colonel By Dr, Ottawa, ON K1A 0K2
* **Contact Person**: Aaron Pound, aaron.pound@forces.gc.ca, (506) 422-7891

## Documents

The attached documents can be found at the following URLs:
* English: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/3998/20230224_cfsce_23206a_npp_e.pdf
* French: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/3998/20230224_cfsce_23206a_npp_f.pdf

Note to Editor: The previous contractor shared some document metadata in a language likevariable; therefore, it was rewritten by an expert technical writer to make it more professional and easy for our audience to understand. Sometimes documents are shared in a simpler format, so these types of transformations can help our users save time as they navigate the contacts data.  Thank you for the text transformation!
